metadata.title: CVE-2017-9210 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description:
libqpdf.a in QPDF 6.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite recursion and stack consumption) via a crafted PDFdocument, related to unparse functions, aka qpdf-infiniteloop3.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqpdf18 - 7.0.0-1
qpdf - 7.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qpdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.0.0-1').
